verses.text_plain: O Lord God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee:
verses.verse_html:
1O Lord God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee: ▼
▼ for the sons: or, of the sons
 , ▼
▼ Maschil…: or, A Psalm of Heman the Ezrahite, giving instruction

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for the sons: or, of the sons
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for the sons: or, of the sons

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Maschil…: or, A Psalm of Heman the Ezrahite, giving instruction
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Maschil…: or, A Psalm of Heman the Ezrahite, giving instruction

verses.text_plain: Let my prayer come before thee: incline thine ear unto my cry;
verses.verse_html: 2Let my prayer come before thee: incline thine ear unto my cry;

verses.text_plain: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.
verses.verse_html: 3For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.

verses.text_plain: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:
verses.verse_html: 4I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:

verses.text_plain: Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand.
verses.verse_html:
5Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand. ▼
▼ from: or, by

tokens.text: no more: and they are cut off

verses.text_plain: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.
verses.verse_html: 6Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.

verses.text_plain: Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, and thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 7Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, and thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves. Selah.

tokens.text: upon me, and thou hast afflicted

verses.text_plain: Thou hast put away mine acquaintance far from me; thou hast made me an abomination unto them: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth.
verses.verse_html: 8Thou hast put away mine acquaintance far from me; thou hast made me an abomination unto them: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth.

verses.text_plain: Mine eye mourneth by reason of affliction: Lord, I have called daily upon thee, I have stretched out my hands unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 9Mine eye mourneth by reason of affliction: Lord, I have called daily upon thee, I have stretched out my hands unto thee.

tokens.text: upon thee, I have stretched out

verses.text_plain: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise and praise thee? Selah.
verses.verse_html: 10Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise and praise thee? Selah.

verses.text_plain: Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave? or thy faithfulness in destruction?
verses.verse_html: 11Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave? or thy faithfulness in destruction?

verses.text_plain: Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?
verses.verse_html: 12Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?

verses.text_plain: But unto thee have I cried, O Lord; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.
verses.verse_html: 13But unto thee have I cried, O Lord; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.

tokens.text: But unto thee have I cried

verses.text_plain: Lord, why castest thou off my soul? why hidest thou thy face from me?
verses.verse_html: 14Lord, why castest thou off my soul? why hidest thou thy face from me?

verses.text_plain: I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up: while I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.
verses.verse_html: 15I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up: while I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.

verses.text_plain: Thy fierce wrath goeth over me; thy terrors have cut me off.
verses.verse_html: 16Thy fierce wrath goeth over me; thy terrors have cut me off.

verses.text_plain: They came round about me daily like water; they compassed me about together.
verses.verse_html:
17They came round about me daily like water; they compassed me about together. ▼
▼ daily: or, all the day

footnotes.body_html: ▼ daily: or, all the day

verses.text_plain: Lover and friend hast thou put far from me, and mine acquaintance into darkness.
verses.verse_html: 18Lover and friend hast thou put far from me, and mine acquaintance into darkness.
